landing.title: Practice Interviews with AI
landing.subtitle: Your AI-powered interview preparation companion. Practice with realistic mock interviews and receive detailed feedback to improve your performance.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome to your interview preparation hub
dashboard.recentSessionsEmpty: Your recent interview sessions will appear here
dashboard.loadError: Failed to load sessions. Please try again.
dashboard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this session?
dashboard.noInterviews: No interviews yet. Create your first one!

createInterview.title: Create New Interview
createInterview.subtitle: Set up a new interview session
createInterview.jobDescriptionHelp: Paste the full job posting to help the AI ask relevant questions
createInterview.resumeHelp: Your resume helps personalize the interview experience
createInterview.personaHelp: Customize how the AI interviewer behaves
createInterview.durationHelp: Choose how long your practice interview should last

lobby.title: Interview Lobby
lobby.guestSubtitle: You've been invited to take this interview
lobby.instructions: Make sure you're in a quiet environment with good lighting. The interview will be recorded for feedback purposes.
lobby.guestInstructions: Make sure you're in a quiet environment with good lighting. Click Start when you're ready.
lobby.inProgressError: This interview is already in progress. Please refresh or contact support.
lobby.inProgressGuest: This interview is already in progress or has been completed.
lobby.errorState: This interview has encountered an error. Please contact support.
lobby.notFound: Interview not found or you don't have access
lobby.linkExpiredOrInvalid: This link has expired or is invalid.
lobby.startAnywayWarning: Starting the interview yourself will use the session. The shared link will no longer work.

session.title: Interview Session
session.connectionLost: Connection lost. Please return to the dashboard.
session.waitingToBegin: Waiting for the interview to begin...

feedback.title: Interview Feedback
feedback.notFound: Feedback not found or you don't have access
feedback.linkExpired: This link has expired or is invalid
feedback.errorMessage: Could not retrieve feedback. Please refresh the page to try again.
feedback.processingMessage: Your feedback is being generated. This may take a minute...
feedback.shareDescription: Anyone with this link can view this interview feedback for 24 hours.
feedback.shareError: Failed to generate link. Please try again.

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences
profile.name: Name
profile.uiLanguageHelp: Choose your preferred language for the interface

auth.signInFailed: Sign in failed. Please check your credentials.
auth.signInError: An error occurred during sign in.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
